website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight walking shoes for casual use. The shoes aren't as tough as other Reebok shoes.
pros: 3D ultralite cushion makes the shoes easy to walk in for everyday use
The material of the shoe contours to your foot so the shoe feels tailor made for you
cons: It can look flimsy compared to other shoes on the market

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as expected but maybe I just have big feet.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and I love how lightweight they are. I wear them all the time. But they do have one big flaw that might only be relevant for the big-footed women. The size 11 fits great in length. It doesn't rub my ankles. But the connection where the sides connect to the toe is oddly tight. I wouldn't recommend these at all for someone with a wide ball/toe pad (?) and definitely not with bunions or any other toe issues at the widest part of the foot. I don't have any foot problems so I still wear them and they aren't too uncomfortable. I would just expect more from a soft sneaker made of essentially a sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: AmberP

customer_reviews.title: Comftylicious
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of these shoes I buy. Soooo comfortabke, just like slippers. And machine washable. The last pair I ought is now 2 or 3 years old and still look in perfect condition even though I walk everywhere with them. They make my feet a bit warm, which I'd love if I was in Wisconsin, but sadly I live in AZ. So I can't wear them during the warm months, but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth IT
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet constantly and always looking for the shoe that doesnt kill me after I take them off. This was purchased with the intent to take to vacation and use for walking. I wore the entire day at work to ensure they were what everyone raved about. I assure you they are! They are light, washable and provided the all day support I needed. I wore from 6:30 a.m. until 11:30 p.m. with NO pounding foot pain afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute..Even Nicer in person!!
customer_reviews.text: These are even cuter in person. The colors are bright and vivid, the design is super cute. They were ordered for my niece in which she states they are very comfortable and fit very well and true to size I wish the bottoms weren't white as they always get dirty fast but they do clean up pretty easily. I love them and would definitely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneaker!! Surprisingly comfortable!! You need this shoe for your wardrobe!! You will get a lot of compliments. Reebok always has great shoes that are a good fit and are comfortable. They wear well, especially their athletic shoes!! You will not be disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shoebabe

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes! Super comfy and I love that they are machine washable. I wear them almost every day and they are holding up great. The only thing that bugs me is the shoe laces are too long and come untied, but that's an easy fix. They also run just a little bit narrow. I wear a 10.5 and ordered an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the color, very cheery to look down at them. I bought my regular size. These are a little large, but, wearing thick socks fixes that. Very comfortable and can be worn all day. I stand a lot at my job. I would buy again in another color.
customer_reviews.author: shubuty100

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Lots of compliments. One thing I wanted to share is that if you have a wide foot (which I do), I'd suggest you buy up 1/2 size (which I wish I had). I've had Reeboks for years and ordered the size I always wear. I've only worn them for two days, so am hoping they stretch. Still, love them and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: daune

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, seriously!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes exceeded my expectations! I bought them to wear to work for my retail job where I am on my feet walking on hard concrete all day. Got home after a long day, and my feet were not even tired! I'm so happy I found these. It is difficult to find shoes that are cute as well as comfy. I'll be buying a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: nanersammich

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, washable, simple sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Very glad Amazon still has some of these in stock! I bought my first pair after getting blisters from my flats on a day in NY (these saved the day!), wore them EVERYWHERE for three years, and finally needed to replace them. Was so sad to learn they were seemingly discontinued...but Amazon came through. Maybe Reebok will start making them again before the backups I bought wear out. :)
customer_reviews.author: Meggo

customer_reviews.title: Will last a good while if not worn every day
customer_reviews.text: They looked great and my wife goes through work shoes like crazy it seems and these lasted a bit shorter than most. Normally she can get 6- 9 months out of a good pair but the sides near the heal got a tear after around 5.
customer_reviews.author: Austin White

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable! But I also think they're cute as well
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! But I also think they're cute as well. I've gotten a few compliments, even though they aren't super exciting as far as footwear goes. The only downside I've experienced would be that they seem to come untied more than I would expect, but that could be user error and I prefer not to double knot them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes, but the toe bed was too snug - right where the seams of the shoe come together. I am hoping to exchange it for a bigger size, but of course the next size up doesn't have prime and is $20 more....
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and extremely light. It's definitely a great choice for raining days. It fits nicely and they're pretty comfortable. Product is just as described. I love the mix of colors and got here just in time. I would definitely recommend them. I took the picture right after the delivery as a reference.
customer_reviews.author: AlexMay

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable & fun shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe! It's super comfortable, fits like a glove and the fun pattern makes it worthy of the 5 stars! Wipes clean nicely and I haven't washed them yet, but am happy to have a shoe that I can throw into the machine if they get too dirty! Highly recommend. Fit as expected, exactly my typical shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: CD-Seattle80

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoe. Really soft fabric and pillow-y interior. My feet are really small, usually wear a 4 - 5.5 WIDE but ordered a 6.5 they were fairly small. Luckily they have free returns/exchange...sso it wasn't a risk.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Ivie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable walking shoe I've ever owned. Gray goes with everything. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit like a glove and super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were made by angels! They are feather-lite, fit like a glove and super comfortable. Also get lots of compliments on the print. Happy shoes make a happy person.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love these fun shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've had another pair of these shoes for over a year and love them. They are machine washable and very comfortable and can be put on without untying. They are starting to get a hole on the inside of the heel, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hilgart

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Around my ankle they are slightly big, other than that they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes and the colors are great
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and the colors are great. They are a little on the large side. I dhould have ordered a half size smaller. My bad.
customer_reviews.author: Charlena S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect as an extra pair of lightweight closed shoes to ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect as an extra pair of lightweight closed shoes to take on a trip with a lot of walking. I have a narrow foot and these were just right with a pair of a socks...
customer_reviews.author: A. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, true to size, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap these are comfortable!! It's like walking on a cloud of air, even on rough/broken pavement. Also good for all-day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Duchess

customer_reviews.title: These are super soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and lightweight. It feels like I'm wearing slippers with them on. My only complaint is that they are a bit narrow for my wide feet, and the seam rubs right at my baby toe. I doubt this would be an issue for normal feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of the most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: one of the most comfortable shoes I own! I love them so much that I actually own a total of 4 pairs of Skyscapes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY AND COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Great!!!!!They are very comfortable on the inside. My aunt had them in two different colors, and told me that they are great for long walks. So I will use them in Europe, during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Tirado

customer_reviews.title: What kind of material is that?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the material. I'm not sure but I'm not feeling these shoes. I give 5 stars because of its light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Marthina Manick

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: Love the color Won't see everyone wearing these. Really cute
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit well, are comfortable, and can be used for miles of city walking.
customer_reviews.author: CJMR

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt expect a very molded arch in these shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt expect a very molded arch in these shoes. They are flat. However there is memory foam inside that holds your foot well.
customer_reviews.author: Panzarella C

customer_reviews.title: What I was missing out on
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM.WALKING ON SOFT CLOUDS...now I get why ppl say that. BEST SHOES EVER
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have it in 3 colors they r the best!
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes!! These are light weight and really comfy. The colors are as pictured and wil be wearable with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the cushion inside is super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Sobosle

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable summer shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable summer shoes I've ever had! If i could i would sleep in them! Also got same ones in pink color!
customer_reviews.author: Olga A.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, walked around almost everywhere in Ireland with these ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, walked around almost everywhere in Ireland with these shoes. Love the look and feel of them. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight shoes that are comfortable and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight shoes that are comfortable and attractive. They fit the same as other Reebok shoes I own. I plan to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small, prices went up for these shoes but I think they're worth $20/25 at most.
customer_reviews.author: Judy K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Wish the color was a bit darker but overall very comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, do run about a half size too big but super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: melissa chase

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes I Have
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. The fit was perfect in my usual size, the color is great and these are so light, yet provide great cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, but I need to return them. How do I do that?
customer_reviews.author: James R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable sneakers available and they are warm and machine washable and dribble. I absolutely love them- I own them in 3 colors and wish I could find more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ginsburg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sneakers. I have quite a few pairs. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th pair of theses shoes I have purchased. I LOVE them. I coach gymnastics and am on my feet all day. They are light weight and comfortable while providing good support.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Boshold

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! After I broke them in I walked 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! After I broke them in I walked 6 miles without any discomfort. It's like walking on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: cblondie

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: Material doesn't seem breathable at all, however, they seem like they would resist water. BUT.... I should have listened to the other reviewers about the tongue being awkwardly large. If it wasn't so thick it might not be so uncomfortable but it has no give and I could see it being annoying when walking or rubbing the top of my ankle if my socks were too low. Returned!!!
customer_reviews.author: Immagini mama

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again...I actually did!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sneaker...so much so that I ordered a second pair as soon as these ones arrived! Extremely lightweight and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: The Silvas

customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe line I have ever owned. This is my fifth pair.
customer_reviews.author: Enzeemom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 71/2 med. I ordered the 8 by mistake but they fit absolutely perfect. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever purchased. I could not see any arch support but they feel like they have support. I went back and purchased 2 more pairs. Love, love, love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is true to size. I got these for a day at Six Flags and my feet didn't hurt after 6 hours of walking/standing. The memory foam is great inside these. Love that they're washable too if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are fun, obviously colorful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My fourth pair in different designs/colors. On the arch support question, "yes" for me since I have custom orthotics that I insert. The shoes are fun, obviously colorful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tashi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and the soft sole makes them easy to wear and walk around in all day. They look nice and go well with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Kalika Saxena

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Soles broke after 2 months- very cheaply made and not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: c barron

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Skyscape Runaround 2.0 Walking Shoe
product_meta.description:
If you need a simple shoe to keep you comfortable all day, this Reebok skyscape runaround 2.0 is a good fit. The upper material is soft and shapes to your foot. The 3D ultralite bottom is super cushiony and lightweight. Plus, this shoe is completely washable.

Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
feature_bullets: Memory tech for enhanced first feel and ultimate comfort
